titles.title: Him that overcometh will I make, will I make,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Him that overcometh will I make, will I make,
A pillar in the temple of my God.
Him that overcometh will I make, will I make,
A pillar in the temple of my God.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And he will go no more out,
And I will write upon him,
The name of my God
And the name of the city of my God;
Him that overcometh will I make, will I make,
A pillar in the temple of my God.
